hero.subtitle: Building strategic bridges between Europe, Africa and the Mediterranean.

featured.label: Featured Report
featured.title: Rethinking Mobility between Mali and Europe
featured.subtitle: A new cooperation framework for sustainable and humane migration management.

0.title: Strategic Dialogue
0.description: Collective intelligence workshops, multilateral forums (Madrid, Brussels, Morocco, Tunisia, Bamako, Dakar) and co-creation with African and European counterparts to validate policies and programs.

1.title: Research
1.description: Review of regulatory frameworks, academic literature, and open sources. Publications with secondary data, surveys, and interviews in Spain, Europe, and the field.

2.title: Outreach and Advocacy
2.description: Policy briefs in ES/EN/FR/AR with practical recommendations; multi-channel campaigns and advocacy rounds before the EU, parliaments, and governments, supported by evidence and testimonies.

newsletter.label: Contact
newsletter.title: Get in touch with us
newsletter.subtitle: Do you have any questions or comments? We are here to help and collaborate on migration and public policy projects.
newsletter.social_text: Open conversations with the IEAM community: updates, live streams, and calls.

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.description: We transform migration complexity into solutions. We believe in cooperation, data-driven analysis, and constructive dialogue to design a future where human mobility is an opportunity for both regions.
hero.floating_quote: "We transform migration complexity into solutions. We believe in cooperation, data-driven analysis, and constructive dialogue to design a future where human mobility is an opportunity for both regions."

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To offer rigorous analysis, propose innovative policies, and generate dialogue spaces that allow for anticipating and managing African migration in a sustainable, humane, and useful way for both regions.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: A Europe connected with Africa through orderly mobility channels that drive shared development in both regions.

principles.title: Principles
principles.subtitle: Values that guide our research and public action.

coresponsibility.title: Co-responsibility
coresponsibility.description: Solutions co-designed with African and European partners.

dignity.title: Dignity
dignity.description: Human approach to the migration reality.

cta.title: Drive the debate. Transform policy.
cta.description: We are not a conventional think tank. At IEAM, we seek analytical minds and practical spirits willing to turn their ideas into real policies.

partners.label: We Collaborate With
partners.description: Academic collaborations are key to reinforcing IEAM's research base, working alongside migration experts, and supporting the implementation of their public policy proposals.

unav.name: University of Navarra
unav.text: Within the framework of the agreement with the University of Navarra, the report "Migrations and Migrants: Irregular Migratory Routes to Europe. Spain, a Case Study" was produced, providing technical analysis on irregular routes to Europe with a special focus on Spain. Publication expected in December 2025.

uir.name: International University of Rabat (UIR)
uir.text: The agreement with UIR reinforces IEAM's Euro-Mediterranean and African perspective, contributing to deepening the analysis of regional mobility dynamics between the Maghreb, West Africa, and Europe.

hero.title: Research
hero.subtitle: Rigorous and evidence-based analysis to inform public policies.
hero.quote: Transforming data into actionable knowledge to build fairer and more effective migration policies.

research.no_results: There are no publications in this category at the moment.

events.hero_description: Seminars, conferences and workshops bringing together experts, institutions, and civil society.
events.hero_quote: Dialogue is the first step towards shared solutions. Every event is an opportunity to build bridges.

upcoming.title: Upcoming Events
upcoming.description: In this section we will publish upcoming IEAM events and activities.

hero.title: Contact
hero.description: We are open to collaboration and dialogue. Tell us how we can help you or work together.
hero.quote: Every conversation is an opportunity to build bridges and create positive impact.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: For general inquiries, research proposals, or press requests, you can use the form or write to us directly.

press.title: Press & Media
press.description: If you need graphic resources, statements, or want to arrange an interview with our research team.

form.title: Send us a message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.privacy_text: I have read and accept the
form.privacy_consent: and consent to the processing of my data to respond to this inquiry.
form.success: Thank you for your message. We will get in touch with you soon.

hero.label: Collaborate with us
hero.title: Support Independent Analysis
hero.description: Your support makes rigorous research on security, migration, and geopolitics in the Euro-African and Mediterranean space possible.

tiers.title: Choose how to collaborate
tiers.subtitle: All contributions directly support our mission of independent analysis.

basic.title: Basic Support
basic.description: Punctual collaboration to support our work
basic.impact: Contributes to the publication of an analysis article

solidarity.title: Solidarity Support
solidarity.impact: Funds the creation of a data infographic

custom.title: Custom Amount
custom.subtitle: Choose the amount you wish to contribute

impact.title: Your Impact
impact.subtitle: Each contribution strengthens our capacity for independent analysis.

research.title: Research
research.description: We publish rigorous analysis on security, migration, and Mediterranean geopolitics.

dialogue.title: Dialogue
dialogue.description: We organize meetings between experts, academics, and policy makers.

independence.title: Independence
independence.description: Your support guarantees our editorial and analytical independence.

other_ways.title: Prefer to collaborate in another way?
other_ways.description: For institutional donations, sponsorships, or special collaborations, contact our team.

footer.contact_info: Independent research center and think tank on migration. Building bridges between Europe, Africa and the Mediterranean.
footer.description: Transforming the migration debate with data and dialogue.
